title: Breathwork Mastery
subtitle: Your breath is the remote control for your nervous system
description: Learn to use your breath as a tool for regulation, energy, emotional release, and altered states. This course covers practical techniques from calming to activating, giving you a complete toolkit for any situation.

modules.title: Breath Fundamentals
modules.description: How breath affects your nervous system and state

modules.title: Calming Techniques
modules.description: Breath practices for anxiety, stress, and sleep

modules.title: Activating Techniques
modules.description: Breath practices for energy, focus, and motivation

modules.title: Breath for Emotional Release
modules.description: Using breath to move stuck emotions

whatYouLearn: Understand how breath directly controls your nervous system
Master techniques for calming anxiety and stress
Use breath to increase energy and focus
Practice safely with more intense breathwork
Build a personalized daily breath practice
requirements: No serious respiratory conditions (consult doctor if unsure)

questions.question: How does extending the exhale affect the nervous system?
What is the physiological sigh?
options: A double inhale followed by a long exhale

questions.question: What type of breathing tends to be more activating?
options: Faster breathing with emphasis on inhale
Breathing through the left nostril only

questions.question: Why can intense breathwork release emotions?
options: Altered CO2/O2 levels can release held tension and bypass mental defenses

questions.question: What is a contraindication for intense breathwork practices?
options: Cardiovascular issues, pregnancy, or severe mental health conditions

questions.question: What's the benefit of nasal breathing over mouth breathing?
options: Nasal breathing filters, warms air and activates the parasympathetic system

questions.question: How often should breathwork be practiced for best results?
options: Daily short practices with occasional longer sessions
